sessions.name: St. Matthews Hospital
sessions.description: The founders of St. Matthews Hospital were convinced that it was possible to provide quality and cost-effective health care in a thoroughly professional but personalized way.Long before the debate on fixed consultant fees started, the hospital had already persuaded its consultants to adopt a very competitive fixed fee structure which is binding on these partner consultants.

speakers.name: St. Matthews Hospital
speakers.about: St. Matthews Hospital - Where Quality is the priority.
